description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=1/3, Mature Content=0/3. CANNONBOT GO!!! One robot vs an alien invasion in this puzzle game with an action edge. Time your moves just right to release a symphony of fire and destruction.
